revision.text:
'''PNJs''' (o '''Personajes No Jugadores''') actúan como útiles guías para el jugador, proporcionándole información sobre diferentes características del juego o dando pistas de localizaciones o requisitos para ciertos [[Obtainable Pokémon|Pokémon]]. ==PNJs por región== ===[[Kanto]] PNJs=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Nombre PNJ !! Localización !! Función |- | Profesor Oak || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pueblo Paleta]] || explica los requisitos para avanzar a la siguiente [[Regions|región]]. |- | Mamá || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pueblo Paleta]] || habla sobre otros PNJs. |- | Anciano || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Ciudad Verde]] || Enseña como usar el menú de [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. |- | Maestro de Batalla || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Ciudad Pétrea]] || enseña el uso de [[Battle Items|Objetos de batalla]]. |- | Científico de Gemas || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Ciudad Pétrea]] || Habla del uso de las [[Gems|Gemas]] y cómo conseguirlas. |- | Dependiente Shady || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Ruta 3 Pokécentro]] || Le dice al jugador sobre los Magikarp. |- | Maestro de Bayas || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Ciudad Celeste]] || Proporciona al jugador pistas sobre el cultivo de [[Berries|bayas]]. |- | Supernecio || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Ciudad Celeste]] || Le dice al jugador de descargar la partida guardada con más frecuencia. |- | Presidente del Club de Fans|| [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Ciudad Carmín]] || Informa al jugador sobre los Tipos de [[Eggs|Huevos]] |- | Sr. Fuji || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pueblo Lavanda]] || Informa al jugador Informs the player about increased rates of [[Shinies|Shiny Pokémon]] |- | Maestro de Batalla 2 || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Ciudad Azafrán]] || Le enseña al jugador sobre amontonar Objetos de Batalla. |- | Criador || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] || Le enseña al jugador sobre criar Pokémon. |- | Gran Gastador || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Ciudad Azulona]] || Le enseña al jugador sobre el botón de cantidad de la [[Shops|Tienda]]. |- | Joven Wendy || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Ciudad Fucsia]] || Informa al jugador del aumento de ratio de [[Roaming Pokémon|Pokémon Errantes]]. |- | Investigador || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Isla Canela]] || Informa al jugador sobre la naturaleza Errante de Mew. |} ===[[Johto]] PNJs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Nombre PNJ !! Localización !! Función |- | Profesor Elm || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|New Bark Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Technology Enthusiast || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|New Bark Town]] || Tells the player about [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Chest mechanics |- | Mr. Pokémon || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cherrygrove City]] || Teaches the player about the [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatchery]] Queue feature. |- | Earl Dervish || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Violet City]] || Teaches the player about [[Baby Pokémon]]. |- | Wise Old Man || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Azalea Town]] || Tells the player about the [[Ilex Forest|location]] and [[Gyms#Johto_Indigo_Plateau|requirement]] needed to unlock Celebi. |- | Bill || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player the requirements of Espeon and Umbreon. |- | Eusine || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player about the requirement of the [[Roaming_Pokémon|requirement]] to unlock the Roaming legendary Beasts . |- | Pokéfan Derek || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player that they now have access to the three legendary Beasts. |- | Kimono Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player about the [[Tin Tower|location]] and [[Roaming_Pokémon|requirement]] needed to unlock Ho-Oh. |- | Big Spender || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] || Teaches the player about the Shop amount button. |- | SS Aqua Captain || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Olivine City]] || Tells the player about the [[Dock]]. |- | Photography Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cianwood City]] || Tells the player about [[Berries#Wandering_Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]]. |- | Souvenir Shop Attendant || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Mahogany Town]] || Tells the player about [[Item Magnet]] effects. |- | Pokéfan Trevor || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Blackthorn City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |}
===[[Hoenn]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Professor Birch || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Littleroot Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Professor Birch's Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Littleroot Town]] || Tells the player about updates to the Hatchery Queue. |- | Tracking Scientist || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Oldale Town]] || Tells the player about the Roaming nature of Latios and Latias. |- | Reporter Gabby || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Slateport City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | Professor Cozmo || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fallarbor Town]] || Informs the player about [[Battle Frontier|Deoxys]]. |- | Weatherman || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || Informs the player about the several forms of Castform. |- | Pokemon Ranger Catherine || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || Tells the player about the overuse of the [[Dowsing Machine]]. |- | Astronomer || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Mossdeep City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Jirachi. |- | Big Spender || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|LilyCove City]] || Teaches the player about Shop amount button. |- | Diver || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Pacifidlog Town]] || Teaches the player about Dungeon Loot rates increasing with clears |- | Gym Leader Wallace || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Sootopolis City]] || Tells the player about the [[Cave of Origin|location]] and [[Gyms#Pokémon League Hoenn|requirement]] needed to unlock Groudon and Kyogre. |}
===[[Sinnoh]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Contest Champion || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Twinleaf Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Mesprit. |- | Professor Rowan || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sandgem Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Beachcomber || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sandgem Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Manaphy. |- | Flower Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Floaroma Town]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Location-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Eevee into Leafeon. |- | Lass Caroline || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Eterna City]] || Informs the player about the [[Old Chateau|location]] and [[Dungeons#Sinnoh|requirement]] for Rotom and its forms. |- | Construction Worker || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Oreburgh City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Nosepass into Probopass. |- | Contest Fan || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Hearthome City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Magneton into Magnezone. |- | Pal Park Warden || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Pal Park]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Weather-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Cherrim (overcast) into Cherrim (sunny). |- | Riley || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the requirement to evolve Riolu. |- | Young Boy || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Cresselia. |- | Young Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Snowpoint City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Eevee into Glaceon. |- | Ribboner Julia || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sunyshore City]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Level-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Pilowswine into Mamoswine. |- | Ace Trainer Quinn || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Fight Area]] || Informs the player about the requirement to unlock [[Distortion World]]. |- | Hiker Kevin || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Survival Area]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |}
===[[Unova]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Musician || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Castelia City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of Meloetta. |- | Excited Child || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Humilau City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of Thundurus and Tornadus. |- | Explorer || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nimbasa City]] || Informs the player about Mimics and the exclusive mimic in [[Relic Castle]] |- | Fan Club Chairman || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Icirrus City]] || Informs the player about how to obtain [[Black DNA]] and [[White DNA]] |- | Professor Juniper|| [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Professor Juniper's Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | Colress || [[P2 Laboratory]] || Challenges the player to defeat him to unlock the Rare Pokémon in the lab. |}
===[[Kalos]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Mystery Fan || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Santalune City]] || Gives a hint about [[File:Detective Pikachu.png|25px]] Detective Pikachu. |- | Professor Sycamore || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Engineer || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]] || Informs the player about the [[Kalos Power Plant|location]] and [[Gyms#Pokémon League Kalos|requirement]] for Volcanion |- | Birdwatcher || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Coumarine City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of the legendary birds. |- | Furisode Girl Katherine || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Laverre City]] || Explains the [[Kalos#Weather-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Sliggoo into Goodra. |- | Hex Maniac Melanie || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Anistar City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | Confused Hiker || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Kiloude City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of Hoopa. |- |}
===[[Alola]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Scratch Cat Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town Outskirts]] || Informs the player about the [[File:Lycanroc (Dusk).png|15px]]Lycanroc (Dusk) Requirement |- | Professor Kukui || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Professor Kukui's Lab]] || Informs the player about the Ultra beasts, Meltan And Tells About the Ub and Meltan Update |- | Kahuna Hala || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town]] || Explains The Trials And Grand Trials |- | Café Owner || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Heahea City]] || Informs the player about The Trials of Akala island and The Kahuna. |- | Actor Meredith || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Paniola Town]] || Informs the player about Oricorio and the berry colors that attracted it in the farm. |- | Kahuna Olivia || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Konikoni City]] || Informs the player about The Alola Pokémon League |- | Aether Branch Chief Wicke || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Aether Paradise]] || Informs the player the Boosted Roamer Rate Route |- | Kahuna Nanu || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Malie City]] || Informs the player of The Requirements To Fight him |- | Worker || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Tapu Village]] || Informs the player about how to evolve [[File:Crabrawler.png|15px]]Crabrawler into [[File:Crabominable.png|15px]]Crabominable |- | Captain Mina|| [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Seafolk Village]] || Informs the player of the Requirements of [[Mina's Houseboat]] Dungeon and where the next Kahuna is |- |}
